text: Tommy Curtis (January 8, 1952August 3, 2021) was an American college basketball player. He played for the UCLA Bruins. He played on two successful national championship teams at UCLA. Curtis died at his home in Port St. Joe, Florida on August 3, 2021. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Point guards Category:Sportspeople from Michigan Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles
title: Tommy Curtis
